clauses.title: Understanding the organization and its context
clauses.description: Determining external and internal issues relevant to the EOMS purpose and strategic direction.

clauses.title: Needs and expectations of interested parties
clauses.description: Determining requirements of learners, other beneficiaries, and staff.

clauses.title: Scope of the EOMS
clauses.description: Determining the boundaries and applicability of the management system.

clauses.title: EOMS and its processes
clauses.description: Establishing, implementing, maintaining and continually improving the EOMS.

clauses.title: Leadership and commitment
clauses.description: Demonstrating leadership and commitment with respect to the EOMS.

clauses.title: Focus on learners and other beneficiaries
clauses.description: Ensuring needs of learners and beneficiaries are met.

clauses.title: Policy
clauses.description: Establishing and communicating the EOMS policy.

clauses.title: Organizational roles, responsibilities and authorities
clauses.description: Ensuring responsibilities are assigned, communicated and understood.

clauses.title: Actions to address risks and opportunities
clauses.description: Planning for issues and requirements to ensure the EOMS can achieve results.

clauses.title: Objectives of the EOMS
clauses.description: Establishing measurable objectives at relevant functions and levels.

clauses.title: Planning of changes
clauses.description: Carrying out changes to the EOMS in a planned manner.

clauses.title: Resources
clauses.description: Providing human resources, infrastructure, and environment for operations.

clauses.title: Competence
clauses.description: Determining and ensuring necessary competence of personnel.

clauses.title: Awareness
clauses.description: Ensuring personnel are aware of the EOMS policy and their contribution.

clauses.title: Communication
clauses.description: Determining internal and external communications relevant to the EOMS.

clauses.title: Documented information
clauses.description: Creating, updating, and controlling required documentation.

clauses.title: Operational planning and control
clauses.description: Planning and implementing processes needed to meet requirements.

clauses.title: Requirements for educational products and services
clauses.description: Communicating with interested parties and determining requirements.

clauses.title: Design and development
clauses.description: Establishing a process for design and development of products/services.

clauses.title: Control of externally provided processes
clauses.description: Ensuring externally provided products and services conform to requirements.

clauses.title: Provision of educational products and services
clauses.description: Implementing operations under controlled conditions.

clauses.title: Release of educational products and services
clauses.description: Verifying that requirements have been met before delivery.

clauses.title: Control of nonconforming outputs
clauses.description: Identifying and controlling nonconforming educational outputs.

clauses.title: Monitoring, measurement, analysis and evaluation
clauses.description: Determining what needs to be monitored and evaluated.

clauses.title: Internal audit
clauses.description: Conducting internal audits at planned intervals.

clauses.title: Management review
clauses.description: Reviewing the organization's EOMS to ensure suitability and effectiveness.

clauses.title: Nonconformity and corrective action
clauses.description: Reacting to nonconformity and taking action to control it.

clauses.title: Continual improvement
clauses.description: Continually improving the suitability and adequacy of the EOMS.

clauses.title: Opportunities for improvement
clauses.description: Actively seeking and identifying opportunities for improvement.
